title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration.

  2. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch. (Octave transpositions of soprano pitches are not allowed.)

  3. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

  2. Award ½ point for each correct Roman numeral that has an incorrect or missing Arabic numeral.

  3. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.

  4. Accept “ii” as a correct Roman numeral even without the diminished sign.

title: III Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score up to the next higher point. (Exception: Round 23½ DOWN).

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question.
